product_name: florence by millsSwimming Under the Eyes Brightening Gel Pads
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganThe Swimming Under the Eyes Brightening Gel Pads from florence by mills are cute lil' whale gel patches that swim under eyes to help you feel re-energized and present again. They are soaked in a soothing essence that hydrates with hyaluronic acid. Here are your new bffs!
details: DetailsBenefitsHelps re-energize tired under eyes by hydratingIncludes 30 pairs for sleepy eyesKey IngredientsSodium Hyaluronate is a super moisturizing form of hyaluronic acid that ditches dullnessNiacinamide helps improve skin's natural moisture barrierFormulated WithoutParabensAnimal testingAnimal by-productsItem 2554829How To UsePut a whale under each eye on clean, dry skin with the tails facing in or out, you choose their adventure, please! Leave them on for 10-15 minutes. Remove and tap remaining serum into the skin with your fingertips.IngredientsAqua (Water, Eau), Glycerin, Niacinamide, Carrageenan, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Arginine, Dextrin, Allantoin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Sucrose, Pinus Sylvestris Leaf Extract, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Propanediol, Cyclodextrin, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Hydroxyacetophenone, Pentylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Hexylene Glycol, Calcium Chloride, Cellulose Gum, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Silica, Polyglyceryl-10 Oleate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Chlorphenesin, Disodium EDTA, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77007 (Ultramarines).
how_to_use: Put a whale under each eye on clean, dry skin with the tails facing in or out, you choose their adventure, please! Leave them on for 10-15 minutes. Remove and tap remaining serum into the skin with your fingertips.

reviews.headline: Rips & Tears Easily
reviews.comments: You have to be pretty careful when removing the pads from the jar as well as handling them/applying them as they rip or tear very easily. Sometimes even small portions break or teat off. I would not recommend.

reviews.headline: Love and swear by the product!!
reviews.comments: This on my way to work allows me to look more alive and removes any dark circles caused in sleepless nights!

reviews.headline: Florence by Mills under eye patches Ôøº
reviews.comments: These burnt so bad on my sensitive skin. I couldn't leave them on for over a minute. I also have to agree with the reviews that they break easy if you don't put them on right and you try to remove them to try and put them in a better spot, they probably will break

reviews.headline: fall apart
reviews.comments: poor quality, they literally melt and break apart so easily.  not sure why a hole was designed into it

reviews.headline: Do not use if you have sensitive skin!
reviews.comments: I love the depuffing under eye pads, so I figured I'd give these a try and I regret that I did. After 3-4 uses, the sensitive skin under my eyes became red, dry and super irritated. I stopped using them a week ago, and I still have what looks like burn marks under my eyes.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: Was excited to try these because it had amazing reviews! They slide down my face way too easy. Half the time they rip due to me pushing them back in place. They also leave behind a residue that becomes flakey once it dries/ definitely causes my concealer to flake. Might just not be the right product for me but I was super dissatisfied!

reviews.headline: Highly recommend
reviews.comments: I've used several under eye patches before and these by far are the best. They did not burn and we're very hydrating. Easy to use. Will definitely buy again.

reviews.headline: My fav of the florence by mills eye pads!
reviews.comments: I tried the green & blue eye pads, green was pretty good, blue wasn't that great. These are my favs!

reviews.headline: Love these!
reviews.comments: Love these & frees my mind of worries being so close to my eyes, knowing it is made of clean ingredients

reviews.headline: Flimsy
reviews.comments: Every time at least 1/2 rips. I use the separater tool ans everything.

reviews.headline: I don't know about these
reviews.comments: They feel nice when you pit them on, but these little circles (you only see holes on the product photo) make using the patches so messy. I couldn't wait to run out and won't repurchase

reviews.headline: My absolute fave!
reviews.comments: These under-eye-patches have been my fave for a very long time!

reviews.headline: This is sorcery
reviews.comments: I dont have dark circles per say just noticed a dullness wanted to try these and wow. If you dont think you need these you do. These will be lifechanging for me.

reviews.headline: Cooling but Slippery and Oversized
reviews.comments: Good price for the size and have a nice cooling feeling on the skin, however they are HUGE.  They're over-saturated and slide down the cheek almost instantly.  The "eye" of the fish is not actually punched out evenly so they get stuck to the skin.

reviews.headline: Favorite eye masks
reviews.comments: I have bought eye masks from mills, and they all work really good, they do their job, and they're really cute, will continue to use and buy, love them!

reviews.headline: Absolutely LOVE this product!!
reviews.comments: At 57 years old, I have been on a very long search for an eye cream or gel to help my inherited under eye puffiness. Found it!! I love their cool feeling when relaxing with them on and I really do wake up with brighter eyes. I don't see the harsh blue shadows from my under-eye puffiness since I've started using them. I will buy again and try their other products.

reviews.headline: Didn't impress me
reviews.comments: Sorry, but these weren't what I hoped for after seeing all the rave reviews. They really didn't do anything for my under eyes. I know this line is meant for young girls who really don't require much skincare, but these weren't even moisturizing. I was surprised at how dry the masks are, even right out of the container.  they are also very very fragile. Whether I used the included little spatula or my fingers, the masks are very prone to tearing. Also I wish that the "eyes" were not still in the container because as you use the masks up you get left with these tiny little circle pieces everywhere from where the holes were cut out for the eyes. The good news is that I didn't have any irritation and didn't notice any bad fragrance.

reviews.headline: OMG #FLORENCELOVE
reviews.comments: I love it so so much ! It hydrates and feels nice on my skin and not harmful.so nice I would recommend this to people with sensitive skin!!! Thanks mills for making this! üíúüê≥

reviews.headline: Works extremely well
reviews.comments: After using almost all the pads in the container I can confidently say that this product does a great job brightening my under eyes and also depuffing them. The only issue i had was that the top layer of pads can dry out a bit, however that was very fixable if i just turned the container upside and left it for awhile. The little eye cutouts can get annoying because they are kind of all over the place but it's not a big deal to me.

reviews.headline: Product is to thin and rips
reviews.comments: I was excited to try becuade the amou t of patches per container compared to others is way more. Well every 1 out of 3 sets rips in half because they are to thin so the. You cant use them.

media.headline: Swimming Under The Eyes Brightening Gel Pads!üêãüíú

faceoff_positive.comments:
There wasn't much serum in mine (don't know how others have so much the pads slide down) and they aren't put in the jar in a way that allows them to be applied with the unexposed side down for both eyes, so I feel like there's even less on one of them. Unless you're not anal about them both facing the same way (E.G.: both whale tails on the outer edge of the eyes). 

I love the way they feel, though. I wasn't sure if they were soaking in/moisturizing but I fell asleep with them on once and they didn't budge. When I felt them afterwards they were definitely drier and less skin-like so they surely are plumped full of serum, and it goes to reason that being kept on the skin and air kept out would make them effective.  

No visible effects, personally, but I don't have any eye issues to try to fix. I'm still on the search for an exceptional eye mask, but I'll keep coming back to these if I try another brand I end up not liking.
faceoff_positive.headline: Feels good, moisturizes

faceoff_negative.comments: So I purchased this product to simply give it a try because I couldn't find the regular gel under eye pads. There is hardly any scent to this product. I gave it 1 stars because the gel pads slip down your face because they made these under eye gel pads to heavy or might be the serum it comes with. I wouldn't buy this product again. It's not a bright purple like the picture shows you. Its a deep dark purple. The wholes to the eye on the whales pops off. If your looking for style go ahead and purchase. But I wouldn't recommend this product. You can't walk around with these gel pads on your face. I'm a mother so im busy on a daily basis. I have to sit to wait the 10 mins to be finished with using this product so it doesn't slip off.
faceoff_negative.headline: Slips off your under eyes

rollup.name: Swimming Under the Eyes Brightening Gel Pads
